articles.author: Paul Chavez
articles.title: Emma Stone portrays 'experiment' Bella Baxter in trailer for upcoming surrealist movie Poor Things - Daily Mail
articles.description: Emma Stone, 34, portrayed work-in-progress 'experiment' Bella Baxter in a new trailer released on Thursday for the upcoming surrealist comedy Poor Things.
articles.content:
